mapper.select: SELECT USER_NUM, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, USER_ZIPCODE, USER_ADD1, USER_ADD2 FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( select rownum as RNUM, s.* from( select O.ORDER_NUM, O.USER_NUM, M.USER_ID, G.STORED_FILE_THUMB, G.GOODS_TITLE, O.ORDER_OP1, O.ORDER_OP2, O.ORDER_OP3, O.ORDER_OP4, O.TRANS FROM TB_ORDER O, TB_MEMBER M, TB_GOODS G WHERE O.USER_NUM = M.USER_NUM AND G.GOODS_TITLE = O.GOODS_TITLE )s) WHERE RNUM >= '0' AND RNUM <= '10'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_GOODS SET GOODS_OP1= '삭제' WHERE GOODS_INDEX= #{GOODS_INDEX}
